snippet: Even the King of Clay Rafael Nadal needs victories to boost his confidence, which has waned recently as his dominance has slipped on the slippery red surface....
lead_paragraph: Even the King of Clay Rafael Nadal needs victories to boost his confidence, which has waned recently as his dominance has slipped on the slippery red surface.

headline.print_headline: Top Seeds Nadal and Ferrer Reach Quarterfinals in Rio
headline.main: Top Seeds Nadal and Ferrer Reach Quarterfinals in Rio
